Package org.gridgain.grid.logger.tomcat

Contains Tomcat implementation for logging.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
GridTomcatLogger Logger to use in Tomcat loaders.
 

Package org.gridgain.grid.logger.tomcat Description

Contains Tomcat implementation for logging. It simply delegates to Tomcat internal logger.
